text: Gu nde kora muuŋgiap, gu nde nzuai buni, gu hiiŋra ki bunin mba vhunaa ga si bunin nde nzuai. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nde thɨga havhargi fhuvara. Gu vhɨra khueŋ vuzvugi, nde tuituigip mba buni kaŋgirga. Nde fhum, nde za fhura wari wo fhavi ndi nɨɨŋgim, nta fhura tɨvi mbatɨgir ŋaara gumgir khɨni kav, nde fhura ferferap, nde vhɨra guigira khaŋ tɨgap tɨvi mbatɨgi guarira muuŋgi. Nde ntigem, wari wo fhavi ndiv tɨvir vhuuin nɨɨŋgip, nde Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi kɨv, nde tɨvi ŋgaravra Fhe Bakɨme nɨman kɨri.
